TopicTitle: Cannot warp faster than x1 BUG

Articles.Content:
hey guys,

as the title says i have a bug with the time warp.

when i try to warp my ships the "Cannot warp faster than x1 while the ship is throttled up" message shows up though my engines are shut down.

that means i cant warp at all, which is very annoying.

i hope you know how to solve this
Did they shut down because they ran out of fuel/oxidizer or a jet that was starved of air, or was this after you set the throttle to 0 (repeated left-ctrl until 0 or just hitting the X key)?
yeah, even if engines aren't *firing*, you still need to hit x to make your *throttle* zero.
